html: Just saw @rickygervais at the @ThePleasance theatre for the warm up gig for his SuperNature tour. It was overly rude, crude and fucking offensive and I hope not one bit of it gets cut for the main tour and or the £50 milion nextflix deal.
text:
Just saw @rickygervais at the @ThePleasance theatre for the warm up gig for his SuperNature tour.
It was overly rude, crude and fucking offensive and I hope not one bit of it gets cut for the main tour and or the £50 milion nextflix deal.

html: @rickygervais thanks for an amazing once-in-a-lifetime intimate performance with one of the greatest of all time (your words, not mine). Can’t wait to see #Supernature on the big stage — just when I thought you couldn’t top Humanity... no one’s gonna know what hit em
text:
@rickygervais thanks for an amazing once-in-a-lifetime intimate performance with one of the greatest of all time (your words, not mine).

html: It is nonsense to claim that one should respect all beliefs. Beliefs need to earn respect. Some beliefs are irrational, immoral bollocks. I can respect your right to hold them without respecting the actual beliefs in any way.
text: It is nonsense to claim that one should respect all beliefs. Beliefs need to earn respect. Some beliefs are irrational, immoral bollocks. I can respect your right to hold them without respecting the actual beliefs in any way.
